title: does alis w still stun you while you're traveling?
body: how come people don't bitch about that?  or never did?

replies.body:
it's usually either part of his WQ combo where the stun on the W isn't important anyway or he knocks you away with it letting you escape despite the stun anyway.

when he gets behind you to W you you're doing something wrong.

flash>q>W isn't a relevant ali combo?  

Q cus enemy retarded>w happens more often than you think


There are many situations where the stun is relevant if it still exists
it is and when you get hit by that you're most likely dead anyway
the flash reverse w though, my mans
